DECLARE @CommunityId_ci varchar(8) DECLARE @JobNumber_ci varchar(8)
SELECT @CommunityId_ci = job.CommunityId, @JobNumber_ci = job.JobNumber FROM vJobSaleLookup vjsl INNER JOIN JOB_Jobs job ON vjsl.JobNumber = job.JobNumber WHERE vjsl.SaleId = :SaleId
exec COM_Items_sel @CommunityId = @CommunityId_ci
